about_the_game:
Grill Guy needs Waifu's help! Tour the Glazed Fields looking for Grill Guy's lost BBQ sauce! Explore various mouth watering sections of the Glazed Fields, a mysterious place that somehow has floating hot dogs and ground beef mountains, is this even edible?

Run and platform across the obstacle course like Glazed Fields! Jump from platform to hot dog while avoiding falling into dangerous pits! Explore all of the levels the Glazed Fields has to offer in this 2D platformer with the end goal of trying to find the lost BBQ sauce. Will Waifu be able to find the BBQ sauce? How did Grill Guy lose his BBQ sauce? And most importantly will the ribs taste good?





Art by Ahseeru
